channel.title: Business News: Get Latest Business News Today along with Share Market updates and Indian Stock Market News | Hindustan Times

image.title: Business News: Get Latest Business News Today along with Share Market updates and Indian Stock Market News | Hindustan Times

item.title: Tata Group-owned Air India nears deal for 150 Boeing 737 Max aircrafts: Report
item.description: Tata Group-owned Air India Ltd. is likely to place a firm order for 50 737 Max jets with an option to acquire as many as 150. The integration is set to make Air India the country’s largest international and second-largest local carrier with a fleet of 218 aircraft.

item.title: Pakistan struggles to keep foreign reserves, black market for dollars springs up
item.description: A black market for dollars has sprung up in Pakistan after the central bank restricted access to foreign currency to preserve dwindling reserves. It has restricted overseas payments and halve the amount of foreign currency that a person can carry overseas to $5,000.

item.title: Big tech-news publishers' economic imbalances must be addressed: HT Digital CEO
item.description: Taylor Owen, Beaverbrook chair in media, ethics and communication at Canada’s Max Bell School of Public Policy, Courtney Radsch, fellow at UCLA Institute for Technology, Law and Policy in the US, and Paul Deegan, president and CEO of News Media Canada, brainstormed ways to build better, fairer, and more fruitful partnerships between tech giants, such as Google and Facebook, and the country’s news publishers.

item.title: How multi asset funds can help with your diversification goals?
item.description: While asset allocation is considered the cornerstone of a successful investment journey, decoding the right formula can be confusing for many investors, especially those who are new to the game. Investing in multi-asset mutual funds has emerged as a convenient way to fill in this gap

item.title: Sensex tumbles 389 points to close at 62,182, Nifty in red at 18,497
item.description: HCL Tech was the top loser in the Sensex pack, skidding 6.72 per cent, followed by Tech Mahindra, Infosys, Wipro, TCS and Reliance Industries.

item.title: Apple finally adopts security parity with iCloud encryption and Message keys
item.description: With cloud backups completely encrypted as well, Apple has tightened what was otherwise a weaker link in the chain of data security

item.title: Things to bear in mind when investing in multi-asset funds
item.description: For investors, the benefits are many, the most appealing one being the ease of maintaining healthy diversification levels in their portfolios without having to go through the laborious process of understanding market dynamics and picking individual assets, and buying and selling them

item.title: Madhya Pradesh an ideal place for investment, CM Chouhan tells US investors
item.description: The chief minister also invited them to attend the Global Investors Summit, which will take place in Indore on January 11 and 12.

item.title: Who is Sushmita Shukla, Indian-origin First Vice President of New York Fed?
item.description: Shukla, who will join the bank in March next year, will be second in its hierarchy, only behind President and CEO, John C Williams.

item.title: As Indian stocks look set to lose momentum, here's what to expect in 2023
item.description: Analysts and strategists also expect the rupee to underperform emerging-market currencies broadly, and the nation’s bonds to benefit from inclusion in major global indexes.

item.title: IndiGo to have its biggest fleet from new Goa international airport. Details here
item.description: Operations at the popular coastal state's second airport – located in North Goa's Mopa village – will kick off next year after a grand inauguration by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on December 11.

item.title: Markets opening alert: Sensex in green at 62,686, Nifty rises to 18,643
item.description: IndusInd Bank was the top gainer in the Sensex pack, rising 1.10 per cent, followed by HUL, Tata Steel, NTPC, SBI, ITC, Nestle India and Maruti.

item.title: Latest Twitter lawsuit says company targeted women for layoffs
item.description: The proposed class action filed late on Wednesday in San Francisco federal court said that after Twitter was taken over by Elon Musk, the world's richest person, it laid off 57% of its female workers compared to 47% of men.

item.title: Weekly Panchang December 9-15: Planetary Transit, Festives, Auspicious Muhuratas
item.description: Get weekly Panchang from December 9-15 to determine the auspicious and inauspicious time for performing day-to-day tasks based on the prevailing planetary position. It comprises of five elements - Vaara, Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga and Karana.
